content.question: Michel Tuffery chose the image of a bull for his work in order to

choices.label: symbolize the powerful forces of the modern globalized economy
pay homage to Pacific Island traditions by referencing a symbol of indigenous culture
evoke the memory of an infamous historic event that had lasting impact
draw attention to the environmental impact of cattle farming in the Pacific Islands

content.answer: draw attention to the environmental impact of cattle farming in the Pacific Islands

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art
